entry.title: Season One Finale - Sin and Sacrifice is OUT!
entry.summary: The latest BSG Deadlock DLC is out! Sin and Sacrifice marks the end of season one, and brings a new story campaign, two new ships and voice chatter for Colonial units. Find out more here.

entry.title: Veterancy Update out now!
entry.summary: The free Veterancy Update is out now! This is a major new update bringing a crew veterancy system, which provides ships with bonuses the longer they survive in the campaign. Along with this is a soundtrack selector, ship inspector and more. Read all about it here.

entry.title: V0.3.2 out now!
entry.summary: Stein V0.3.2 is out now! This latest update brings two new dungeons - Bitterburg Ruins and Bitterburg Keep, 70 new items, 10 new quests and more. Read the full update notes here.

entry.title: How to catch a Wyrm
entry.summary: I've noticed quite a few people asking how to catch a Wyrm in Aground, so I've put together a short guide here. Hope it helps!

entry.title: V0.3.1 out now!
entry.summary: Stein V0.3.1 has arrived, bringing a new wave dungeon, crafting items, weapons and more. Read about it here.

entry.title: A couple more Stein quests
entry.summary: Hi guys, I've added a couple more Stein quest guides to the site: Collect Faligob Slime and Find Foodbox. I've also spent a while figuring out the easiest way to kill Cygluln Hunters. I've got a pretty solid method figured out, so expect a guide tomorrow. Thanks for visiting as always.

entry.title: New Stein quest guides
entry.summary: Even more Stein quests! I've just added the following: Find Hjalmars Pitchfork, More Wine and Talk to Jarmil Soukup.

entry.title: 3 new Stein quest guides
entry.summary: I've just finished adding 3 new Stein quest guides: Kill Wasp Fighter, Find the Teddy and Talk to Hjalmar Karlsen. Hope they help!

entry.title: Stein quests!
entry.summary: I've finished up the quests in Northwind Farm, adding 3 new guides: Hunt Hungry Forest Bears, Hungry Bear Mother and Collect Blueberries. Have a great weekend!

entry.title: New Stein quest guides
entry.summary: I've been having fun in Northwind Farm tonight, bringing you 4 new Stein quest guides: Decimate the Sheep, Slaughter Pigs, Kill Forest Boars and Collect Wool Boxes.

entry.title: More Stein!
entry.summary: Hello everyone! I'm continuing work writing guides for all the Farshore area quests in Stein. I've just added the following: Help Kiana Dejesus, Find Dirk Daristan, Find Viliatus Carlsen and Leaf Beetle Remainings. Happy questing.

entry.title: 6 New Stein Quest Guides!
entry.summary: I hope everyone had a wonderful New Year's Eve, and isn't too hung over! And if you are, well sit back, relax, and play some Stein. I've just added the following quest guides: Collect Filled Box, Motivate Fieldworkers, Kill Mad Boars, Collect Boar Poop, Bring Casamir Poop, and Help Casamir.

entry.title: Ask Plamen Lambert quest guide and Happy New Year!
entry.summary: I've just added a walkthrough for the Ask Plamen Lambert quest. I also hope everyone has a wonderful New Years! 2019 is going to be great.

entry.title: Quests, quests, quests!

entry.title: 3 More Quests!
entry.summary: I'm back with a few more quests: Talk to Alan Daristan, Find Aska Daristan and Help Aska Daristan. Hope you find them useful.

entry.title: 3 New Stein Quest Guides
entry.summary: I hope everyone is having a good weekend! I've just added 3 new Stein quest guides: Kill Brown Bears, Collect Bear Bones and Kill Beowulf the Old. Hope they help.

entry.title: Stein Quest Guide

entry.title: 2 More Stein Quests
entry.summary: Well it's that weird time between Christmas and New Year. Some people are working. Some people are getting drunk at 10 am. But I don't think many people care much about anything. Myself, I've just added 2 new Stein quest guides to the site: Kill Furious Boars and Collect Cave Bug Wings. Enjoy.

entry.title: Happy Boxing Day and More Stein Quests
entry.summary: I hope everyone had a wonderful Chirstmas, and is now enjoying boxing day. I've just updated the site with three more Stein quest guides: Find Rory Pulu, Where is Quintin Conner and Kill Little Cave Bugs.

entry.title: Merry Christmas!
entry.summary: I hope everyone has a wonderful Christmas.

entry.title: Stein Quest Guides
entry.summary: I've just added guides for the Destroy Spider Cocoons and Collect Harvest quests. Hope they help!

entry.title: Internal Links
entry.summary: I've added internal links to all existing guides to make navigating around easier. For example, if a quest is listed as a prerequisite, you can now click it to find out more information. I've also tweaked some URLs to make things more consistent. For example, game hubs can be reached at both /game and game/index. Links around the site now use the former, simpler syntax.

entry.title: About and Contact Pages
entry.summary: I have (finally!) got around to setting up the About and Contact pages. Say hi!

entry.title: Anabasis now has difficulty levels
entry.summary: You can now choose between, easy, normal and hard difficulty in the Operation Anabasis game mode. This update also brings a number of smaller fixes. Get all the details here.

entry.title: Comments and Favicons
entry.summary: I've finished adding comments and favicons. Click read more for the details.
entry.content:
Sorry for the lack of update yesterday, I was in the process of adding a comments system. This has now been finished.

I decided to use Disqus as the comments system. In my experience, Disqus is generally very popular. I've actually seen sites implement a custom comments system, and people ask them to move to Disqus instead as they prefer it - they must be doing something right.

I've set Disqus to only load when a button is clicked, so the impacts on page load time should be minimal. If you're not interested in comments, they won't impact you. I've also enabled guest posting, so while you do need to provide an email address (unfortunately I can't change this), you won't need to register for a Disqus account.

I really hope you enjoy the comments system. I know some sites have been moving away from comments in recent years, but I think having a sense of community on a site is great. I'll be responding to all messages as soon as I can, so please do feel free to ask questions, make suggestions, point out mistakes and anything else!

Disqus does require JavaScript. For those who prefer to browse the web with JS disabled, I'll be adding some alternative contact methods in the coming days (probably a contact form and email address) so you can still get in touch.

In other news, I've finally added favicons. I've used the awesome Real Favicon Generator, so the icons should look good across all browsers, when pinned to your phone homescreen and anything else.

The finishing touches on the site should be finished in the next couple of days, then back to writing content!

Thanks for visiting as always.

entry.title: All Games Button Fixed
entry.summary: Little bit embarrassing, but turns out the "All Games" button on the homepage wasn't linking anywhere, whoops. All fixed now.

entry.title: More Stein Quest Guides!
entry.summary: I'm continuing on my quest for, er, quests. The following new walkthroughs have been added: Talk to Catherine, Gather Aseona Berries, Bring Roseen Greenhill Berries, Talk to Gilbert Greenhill, Bring Roseen a Big Fish and Find Aad Zweerink. Hope you find them useful!

entry.title: More Stein Quest Guides
entry.summary: I've added the remainder of the Stein quest guides I've written, you can take a look here. I'll be working on getting more added in the coming days.

entry.title: Stein Quest Guides
entry.summary: I've started the process of adding the Stein quest guides I've written to the site. Many Stein quests are rather simple, but in others it's not always clear where to go or what to do, so hopefully some people find them useful. I need to do the quests anyway, so why not document it, right? :) You can view them here In other news, the news(!) links in the game headers and indexes now work correctly.
